subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Kelly Pavlik, who holds the World Boxing Council and World Boxing Organization middleweight titles, beat Jermain Taylor for the second time in four and a half months, winning a unanimous decision at the MGM Grand Garden in Las Vegas. Pavlik (33-0, 29 knockouts), whose titles were not at stake, failed to knock out his opponent for the first time in 10 fights. But he landed more memorable exchanges than Taylor (27-2-1), who came up just short on all three judges’ scorecards.
